NK081(zhu)006:1: // sku gdung las kyi phreng ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK081(zhu)006:2: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK081(zhu)006:3: gsang ba chen po'i rgyud dag las //
NK081(zhu)006:4: sku gdung spel mchod rim pa zhig /bdag gzhan snang dang mi snang phyir //
NK081(zhu)006:5: legs par bsdus te bstan par bya //
NK081(zhu)006:6: pha dang ma yi sems ldan mis //
NK081(zhu)006:7: mtha' yas bu yi sems bzhag ste //
NK081(zhu)006:8: tshogs chen zung la lam bya'i phyir //
NK081(zhu)006:9: mi rtog ngang du rtog med 'dug /de las skad cig las kyi lha //
NK081(zhu)006:10: gsal byas lha dgu 'am bcu gcig ldan //
NK081(zhu)006:12: grangs nges sngags kyi nga rgyal bskyed //
NK081(zhu)006:13: ba m+aa dzahdang e h+ya hi //
NK081(zhu)006:14: se gol kyo ga ta yis dgug /dza h'u bam hohs thim byas te //
NK081(zhu)006:15: 'bru brgyad sngags kyis brtan par bya //
NK081(zhu)006:16: de ltar gsal ba'i rnal 'byor pas //
NK081(zhu)006:18: rkos phor sbyangs la gnas gdan sngags //
NK081(zhu)006:19: brjod pas gzhal yas gdan gsum ldan //
NK081(zhu)006:20: 'byung lnga rgyu nyid byin rlob pa'ang //
NK081(zhu)006:21: spyi dang khyad par snga ma nyid //
NK081(zhu)006:22: khong steng rgya ldan rnam dag sngags //
NK081(zhu)006:23: nga rgyal ldan brjod stong chen rgyu //
NK081(zhu)006:24: lhun grub cir bsam snang byin rlobs //
NK081(zhu)006:25: phyi ma lnga yi dbyings phyug la //
NK081(zhu)006:26: khong stong rgya ldan b+ai ra //
NK081(zhu)006:28: ye shes rdo rje srog ldan bya //
NK081(zhu)006:29: de bzhin spyan ma 'debs pa'i rgya //
NK081(zhu)006:30: dang badz+ra da ra dza a d+ha ra ka s+w+aa h+aa yis //
NK081(zhu)006:31: snga ma bzhin du byin rlob bo //
NK081(zhu)006:32: ma m+aa ki la rdo rje bsdoms //
NK081(zhu)006:33: mthe chung bsgrengs te smi rin //
NK081(zhu)006:34: da ra badz+ra s+w+aa h+aa yis //
NK081(zhu)006:35: ting 'dzin srog dang ldan par bya //
NK081(zhu)006:36: gos dkar khong stong sbyar spros pas //
NK081(zhu)006:38: ga sha s+w+aa h+aa gsang sngags kyis //
NK081(zhu)006:39: gong ma bzhin du byin gyis rlobs //
NK081(zhu)006:40: sgrol ma thal mo sbyar bya zhing //
NK081(zhu)006:42: pra tsa la mo hu li rgya //
NK081(zhu)006:43: da ra s+w+aa h+aas byin gyis rlobs //
NK081(zhu)006:44: shes rab grangs 'dzin thabs kyis gdab //
NK081(zhu)006:45: h'u dang badz+ra d+h+rika m+aum d+h+aa /
NK081(zhu)006:46: t+we shwa ra yi sngags brjod cing //
NK081(zhu)006:47: 'byung lnga ye shes rdo rje la //
NK081(zhu)006:48: rkos phor reg pas gzhal yas gdan //
NK081(zhu)006:49: nang ngo phyi rol sku gzugs dbyibs //
NK081(zhu)006:50: mi bskyod yab yum 'khril bzhugs pa'i //
NK081(zhu)006:51: 'od kyis don mdzad lha chen bskor //
NK081(zhu)006:52: de nyid 'byung lnga gang yin mkha' //gang brlab rang gis lha mos gang //
NK081(zhu)006:53: so so'i gsang sngags brjod byas te //
NK081(zhu)006:54: srog ldan rnal 'byor snga ma bzhin //
NK081(zhu)006:55: phrin las lnga rnams grub 'dod na //
NK081(zhu)006:56: rgyu lnga bzhi la las brtsams pa'ang //
NK081(zhu)006:57: gzhi la snang mdzad gsang sngags ldan //
NK081(zhu)006:58: sh+ain+ti ku ru s+w+aa h+aas mdzes //
NK081(zhu)006:59: chos sku thig le 'od dkar gyis //
NK081(zhu)006:60: gzas bkug gdan byas 'od thim zhing //
NK081(zhu)006:61: rgyas la 'byung ldan yab yum sngags //
NK081(zhu)006:62: pish+tam ku ru s+w+aa h+aa yis //
NK081(zhu)006:64: bkug gdan 'od thim bdag rgyas bya //
NK081(zhu)006:65: dbang la rta mgrin mtha' yas sngags //
NK081(zhu)006:66: che ge wa sham ku ru yis //
NK081(zhu)006:68: gdan byas 'od bstim dbang du bsdu //
NK081(zhu)006:69: drag po badz+ra he ru'i sngags //
NK081(zhu)006:70: che ge gsod pa'i sngags brjod pas //
NK081(zhu)006:71: chos sku gru gsum 'od nag gis //
NK081(zhu)006:72: bkug cing 'od bstim bsgral bar bya //
NK081(zhu)006:73: don yod grub pa'i rnal 'byor ram //
NK081(zhu)006:74: chos sku lhun grub la gnas bya //
NK081(zhu)006:75: chos rnams rang spyi rtogs 'dod pas //
NK081(zhu)006:77: 'od kyis sgrib sbyangs rtogs skal ldan //
NK081(zhu)006:78: nang gdan gtso bzhugs kun la'o //
NK081(zhu)006:80: lha de nye bar bsgrub pa na //
NK081(zhu)006:81: lha yi 'bring po bris bcug brjod //
NK081(zhu)006:83: 'jig rten lha de dbang med dgug /mchod sogs rdzogs la las bya'o //
NK081(zhu)006:84: gang zhig 'pho ba'i don byed pa'ang //
NK081(zhu)006:85: gang goms lha yi rnal 'byor pas //
NK081(zhu)006:86: gdab bya tha ma gnyis mtha' ru //
NK081(zhu)006:88: phata brjod dud 'gro'i rgyud sbyang ngo //
NK081(zhu)006:89: pa tsa gnyis dang sarba pre ta ga /te h'u phata kyis yi dwags rgyu'o //
NK081(zhu)006:90: da h+aa gnyis dang sarba na ra ka /he tum h'u brjod 'od 'phros pas //
NK081(zhu)006:91: sngar bzhin bkug la 'od kyis spyad //
NK081(zhu)006:92: yang na mi bskyod rnal 'byor ldan //
NK081(zhu)006:93: rgyun gcod sngags kyis sbyang bar bya //
NK081(zhu)006:94: de nas sku gdung byin rlob ste //
NK081(zhu)006:95: chos kyi sku ru byin gyis rlob pa ni //
NK081(zhu)006:96: rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe bong brtsegs te /
NK081(zhu)006:97: ye d+harma he tu pra b+ha w+aa he tun+te sh+aan+ta th+aa ga to h+ya wa data&a&a&a /
NK081(zhu)006:98: te shany+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e wam ba d+ai ma h+aa sh+ra ma na ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK081(zhu)006:99: zhes brjod de chos kyi skur byin gyis rlob bo //
NK081(zhu)006:100: rgyu 'bras kyi chos spyi'i sngags rgyas byin gyis rlob pa ni /
NK081(zhu)006:102: badz+ra ku sha smri ta u pa s+tha sa ma
NK081(zhu)006:103: ya ka sa da ri d+hi in+t+ra ba la b+ho
NK081(zhu)006:104: d+hi a g+aar+ya mrga pa ri pur+na be ni ka
NK081(zhu)006:106: zhes rgyu yi chos kun rdzogs par byin gyis rlob //
NK081(zhu)006:107: 'bras bu'i chos rdzogs par byin gyis rlobs pa ni /
NK081(zhu)006:108: mnyam pa'i phyag rgya 'od 'phro bar byas la /
NK081(zhu)006:109: badz+ra dz+ny+aa na pany+tsa ka ya gu na gar+b+ha su mi tra sha tri ni /
NK081(zhu)006:110: ku ru sarba dz+ny+aa na waka sa ma t+aa ya a mo g+h+aa ya s+w+aa h+aa /
NK081(zhu)006:112: sku dang ye shes su gsal ba la 'bras bu'i chos rdzogs par byin gyis rlob bo //
NK081(zhu)006:113: de la rang bzhin rab gnas pa'ang /
NK081(zhu)006:114: spyan las byas pa brgya rtsa brgyad //
NK081(zhu)006:116: rab gnas sbyin sreg rgyas par bya //
NK081(zhu)006:117: yi dam nar ma'i sbyor ba las //
NK081(zhu)006:118: rang bzhin mchod rten lhar bcas pa //
NK081(zhu)006:119: snyan dbab spyan drangs bstim brtan bya //
NK081(zhu)006:120: sngon bzhin byas la phyag gis mchod //
NK081(zhu)006:121: a ti pra ti pu hohyisa /
NK081(zhu)006:122: spyi dpral phyag dang lan rdzogs bya //
NK081(zhu)006:123: kun bzang mchod pa nam mkha' mdzod //
NK081(zhu)006:124: sngags dang phyag rgyas mchod pa bya //
NK081(zhu)006:125: bzed zhal rgya ldan a ha ras //
NK081(zhu)006:126: phyag dang zhabs bsil gsol bar bya //
NK081(zhu)006:127: lha mo bzhi yi sngags phyag rgyas //
NK081(zhu)006:128: spyan shangs sku la thim pa bya ///
NK081(zhu)006:129: 'jig rten brtan g.yo thams cad kun //
NK081(zhu)006:130: rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gnas mod kyang //
NK081(zhu)006:131: gzung 'dzin rnam rtog zhags pa yis //
NK081(zhu)006:132: rang gi sgrib shing bdag tu bcing //
NK081(zhu)006:133: kun gyis yang dag rtogs bya'i phyir //
NK081(zhu)006:134: de bzhin chos sku'i gzugs brnyan bstan //
NK081(zhu)006:135: rtog dang mi rtog rang rig dang //
NK081(zhu)006:136: yang dag thabs chen rdzogs pa'i don //
NK081(zhu)006:137: sna tshogs phrin las rnam par rol //
NK081(zhu)006:138: don gyi snying po mchog rnams dang //
NK081(zhu)006:139: byang chub mchog rnams rab tu rdzogs //
NK081(zhu)006:140: 'jig rten gtso mchog rnams kyis bskor //
NK081(zhu)006:141: a hohthala sbyar brjod de ka ya waka /tsit+ta tish+tha badz+rasa brtan /
NK081(zhu)006:142: bdag gzhan gnyis ka'i don gyi phyir //
NK081(zhu)006:143: 'khor lo ngang mchu'i rang bzhin du //
NK081(zhu)006:144: bka' yi bcud bsdus bsod nams kyis //
NK081(zhu)006:145: mtha' yas sems can 'tshang rgya shog //
NK081(zhu)006:146: sku gdung las kyi phreng ba rdzogs so //
NK081(zhu)006:147: rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma las mdzad pa
NK081(zhu)006:148: lo ts+aa ba gnyag dz+ny+aa na ku m+aa ras bsgyur
NK081(zhu)006:149: zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
